description: If you've started the race in gate block 1, 2, or 3, your speed and acceleration will slightly increase at the start, and then during the Final Leg, your acceleration will slightly increase and your stamina will recover

name: Spurt Hero
description: During the Final Leg, your acceleration will slightly increase, you'll get a great speed boost, and your stamina will recover

name: Best in Japan
description: Everyone's expectations strongly inspire the skill user, increasing velocity on the final corner. (Long)

name: The Future in My Hands
description: Mile/Medium・At a random point during the second half of the race, you will get a speed boost and your stamina will slightly recover

name: Guts of the Rising Sun
description: Long・Greatly increase speed during a random point on the Final CornerSpecial Week (Commander)'s evolved skill

name: Hope Comes Around
description: Mile/Medium・At a random point during the second half of the race, you will get a great speed boost and your stamina will recoverRhein Kraft (Alt Version)'s evolved skill
